name: Laravel: Update Tests for Changes
description: Manual hook to ensure tests are updated when modifying features
prompt:
Help me update or create tests for recent changes:
1. Ask me what feature or file was modified
2. Search for existing related tests in tests/ directory
3. If tests exist, review and suggest updates to cover new behavior
4. If no tests exist, create appropriate feature or unit tests using `php artisan make:test`
5. Run the tests with `php artisan test --filter=<testname>` to verify they pass
6. Remind me that every change must be programmatically tested per project guidelines
